## Voice.on() method

Cancelled call invite event. Raised when a pending incoming call invite has been cancelled and is no longer valid.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
on(cancelledCallInviteEvent: Voice.Event.CancelledCallInvite, listener: Voice.Listener.CancelledCallInvite): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  cancelledCallInviteEvent | [Voice.Event.CancelledCallInvite](./twilio-voice-react-native.voice_namespace.event_enum.md) | The raised event string. |
|  listener | [Voice.Listener.CancelledCallInvite](./twilio-voice-react-native.voice_namespace.listener_namespace.cancelledcallinvite_typealias.md) | A listener function that will be invoked when the event is raised. |

<b>Returns:</b>

this

- The call object.
